description: This file defines a Flutter widget called QuizCard that displays a multiple-choice quiz question with styling for correct and incorrect options, including highlighting and icons based on user interaction.

classes.name: QuizCard
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a quiz question prompt and options, showing visual feedback after an answer is given.

methods.name: _optionColor
methods.description: Returns the background color of an option based on whether answers are shown and if the option is correct or selected.

methods.name: _optionBorder
methods.description: Returns the border color of an option based on answer state, highlighting correct or selected options.

methods.name: _optionIcon
methods.description: Determines the icon (check or cancel) to display for each option based on answer correctness and selection.

methods.name: _iconColor
methods.description: Returns the icon color for correct or selected options.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the quiz card, including prompt display and options with interactive styling.
